project.name: eudev
project.description: eudev is a fork of system-udev with the goal of better supporting systems that do not use systemd.

longdescription.p: eudev is a fork of system-udev with the goal of obtaining better compatibility with existing software such as OpenRC and Upstart, older kernels, various toolchains and anything else required by users and various distributions.

body.p: Our git repository is located on github. This is intended to enable interdistribution collaboration on eudev development.
Our IRC channel is #gentoo-udev on freenode. If you are interested in taking part in eudev development or just want to watch, feel free to join us there.
